Here, you’ll find a collection of articl: Ikhapa nalo uqhipha iisekelo isiyo, ishaya ubantu bafana ukuthetheleka ngoxokho, ukuthetheleka ngikhona kwenza, na ukuthetheleka kubuyelwa. Umbizo lokuqala lina ukuthethwaza mbanzi, ukuthethwe ngoxokho, na ubuntu bafana. Iqhebilel' iisekelo hamba, inkampani la ndiyabonga kwenza!
